{/* Hero Section */}

UCSP

Understanding Culture, Society, and Politics - Explore our group presentations and research.

Homepage
{/* Groups Section */}

Our Groups

{/* Group 1 Card */}

Group 1

Discover the ancient wisdom and traditions of Asia, from the philosophy of Confucius to the art of tea ceremonies.

View Presentation →
{/* Group 2 Card */}

Group 2

Experience the vibrant rhythms, rich storytelling traditions, and diverse tribal cultures of Africa.

View Presentation →
{/* Group 3 Card */}

Group 3

Journey through the Renaissance, classical music, and architectural marvels that define European heritage.

View Presentation →
{/* Group 4 Card */}

Group 4

Explore the melting pot of cultures, from Native American traditions to modern pop culture influences.

View Presentation →
{/* About UCSP Section */}

About UCSP

Understanding Culture, Society, and Politics (UCSP) is a course that explores the dynamic relationships between culture, society, and politics. Through our group presentations, we examine how these three elements interact and influence each other in different contexts around the world.

Culture

Shared beliefs, values, and practices that shape human behavior

Society

Social structures and relationships that organize human communities

Politics

Power dynamics and governance systems that regulate social life

); }; export default UCSP;
